ovdesc.p: This application sets the list of events which are allowed in DD module & only these events can be given in Status field of DD modules such as DD.DDI, DD.STANDALONE, DD.ITEM.

desc.p: Defines the description for the event which is added here. This appears as an enrichment wherever this Activity is used.
1-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input).
The id to this application is an event which is recognized by other Direct Debit applications.
The description given for the event appears as an enrichment when an event is referred in other DD applications.
Following are the list of events which are allowed in DD.EVENTS.
Please refer to the Status field help text of DD.DDI & DD.ITEM wherein the allowed status for the application is given along with description.
ID should have any one of the above value.
